title: Learn about the interpretation of a snake bite in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Snake bite in a dream: A snake is a crawling animal that causes harm to a person if it bites him, and many people are afraid of him as soon as he sees him, so if a person dreams of a snake or is bitten by a snake in a dream, then he will speed up. To search for different interpretations related to this vision, and whether it is good for him or not. Therefore, in the following lines, we will show the interpretation of a snake bite in a dream. A snake bite in a dream. Learn about the various indicators that scholars have received in interpreting a snake bite in a dream: Sheikh Ibn Shaheen - may God have mercy on him - mentioned that if a person sees in his dream that he has been bitten by a snake, This is evidence of consistent recovery if he suffers from a health problem and if the dreamer is young and unmarried. Man, he will get married soon if God wants. If a person dreams that a black snake has bitten him, this means that he will be seriously harmed by a member of his family, and the dream indicates the machinations of some people for the dreamer if the bite hits his head. Whoever sees in his dream that the snake bites him On his neck, this is a sign that there are people around him who hate him, hate him, and know that they are harming him. If the fortuneteller is a married woman, she will face. Many problems with her life partner. Why do you wake up confused when you find your interpretation? A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. A snake bite in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin - may God have mercy on him - reported that the bite of a snake in a dream indicates the benefit of benefit and earning a lot of money in the coming period. If he sees While a person is sleeping that a snake is attacking him, this leads to the presence of many rivals and rivals who wish him harm and harm. If a snake bites him, this is harmful to him, and if he is able to kill, he will be able to annihilate his enemies. Cutting a snake into two parts in a dream is a sign of good fortune. Broad and happy events. But if a woman dreams that she is cutting a snake into three parts, this is a sign of her separation from her husband. A snake bite in a single woman’s dream. Jurists explained that a snake bite in a dream for an unmarried girl has many interpretations, the most important of which is what can be clarified through the following: If a girl sees in her dream that a snake is biting her neck, this means that she will be subjected to sexual assault. If an unmarried woman dreams of a very strong snake that bites her twice, this is a sign that her life will change for the better and she will be saved from many evils that were about to befall her. And in The case of an unmarried woman who sees that she was bitten by a snake only once during her sleep, this is an indication of her inability to achieve her dreams and she faces many problems in her life, whether emotionally or professionally. When a girl dreams that a snake is biting her legs but she does not feel it, the dream proves She committed sins and acts of disobedience with her intention, and the matter may go as far as committing adultery or working in prostitution. A snake bite in a dream for a married woman. If a woman is bitten by a black snake in her dream, this is a sign that she is afflicted with witchcraft and envy that spoil her life and lead to divorce. If the woman has been married for many years and God has not yet blessed her with

title: Interpretation of thorns in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of thorns in a dream: thorns are not loved because they cause a bad and painful shock, but in reality they are there to protect that branch or that delicate flower. We avoid damaging them until we eat them for the taste of this delicious green, but there are thorns that are difficult to approach and very painful and pierce them like cactus of any kind. Interpretation of seeing thorns in a dream, interpretation of Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing thorns in a dream carries many symbols, including that it indicates Ignorance, intolerance, and disorder. Being injured by thorns in a dream indicates harm to the dreamer in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is walking on thorns, this dream indicates escaping from a problem in reality. As for seeing a lot of thorny plants, this vision shows the dreamer’s bad character. Interpretation of seeing thorns in a dream, interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted seeing thorns in a dream as evidence of the presence of some problems in the dreamer’s life, in the event that he sees his hand full of thorns. If the dreamer sees thorns hitting his leg in a dream, this vision symbolizes the wrong path he is taking in reality and he must pay attention to it. If a man sees that his hand is infested with many thorns, then this vision indicates that he will face many problems in his life. If he is sitting on the ground of a garden with thorns in his hand, then this vision indicates that he is searching for a job opportunity in reality. Interpretation of the vision of thorns For a single woman: As for the meaning of this dream for an unmarried woman, if she sees thorns scattered in abundance next to the flowers and tries to pick one of them, but she is afraid to approach these thorns, then this vision expresses her feeling of fear. Worry about what happened in her life. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is plucking a rose and finds thorns stuck to her finger, then this vision indicates her inability to make the right decisions. In the case of an unmarried woman who sees many thorns stuck in her hand and she is unable to remove them, this vision is an indication of difficulties and problems. Which she faces in her life, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing thorns for a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, when she sees in a dream that prickly figs hurt her when she eats them, then this dream indicates the emergence of problems in her life. In the event that a married woman dreams that her son is playing in a garden Full of thorns, this vision indicates that he is truly sick, and God knows best. But if a married woman sees that her husband is in pain from the thorns stuck in his hand and he is unable to remove them, then this vision symbolizes the accumulation of debts on him in reality. Interpretation of seeing thorns for a pregnant woman. As for the symbol of this dream for a pregnant woman If she sees in a dream that her husband is suffering from his thorny hand, then this vision indicates love and happiness in their married life. But if the pregnant woman sees that she is holding a bouquet of roses and thorns in her hand, hitting her with her hand, then this dream indicates the pain and pain of pregnancy, and God knows best. If she is sitting in the A garden with infected thorns, this indicates a financial crisis in her life. In conclusion, it is mentioned that you treat some plants with great care so that they do not become infected with thorns.

title: Interpretation of seeing a tennis racket in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tennis racket in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com, as seeing a tennis racket and playing tennis is one of the most popular games among children and adults, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision For a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, men, young men, and divorced women. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a tennis racket in a dream? Seeing a tennis racket in a dream indicates disputes and disputes between the fortuneteller and others. What is the interpretation of seeing a tennis racket in a dream for Al-Nabulsi? Seeing a tennis racket in a dream In a dream for Nabulsi, running after a ball indicates the dreamer’s interest in worldly pleasures, following desires, staying away from the afterlife, and preparing for it. See also: Interpretation of seeing Cristiano Ronaldo in a dream. What is the interpretation of a single girl who sees a tennis racket in a dream? A single girl seeing a tennis racket in a dream indicates that she passed She has many problems with her fiancé, which may lead to failure and separation from him. I see myself playing tennis in a dream. It shows that she and her family are exposed to many disagreements and financial problems that bring them sorrows and worries. What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees a tennis racket in a dream? Seeing a tennis racket for a married woman In a dream, it is a sign of marital disputes and quarrels, and an attempt to gain possession and overcome them to stabilize their lives. See also: Interpretation of seeing playing ball in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees a tennis racket in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman’s tennis racket in a dream is a sign of good health for her and her child, and freedom from pain and problems during childbirth. What is the interpretation of seeing the color of the ball in a dream? Seeing a red tennis ball in a dream indicates a happy and peaceful life. Seeing a black tennis ball in a dream is a sign of deception and attention from those close to him, purity of intention and goodness of heart, and yellow indicates money and abundance of goodness. See also: Interpretation of seeing a shirt collar In a dream, what is the interpretation of seeing exercise in a dream? Seeing exercise in a dream is a sign of love for movement, travel, pursuing goals, and securing the future. Watching sports in a dream indicates strength of character, tyranny, and determination to face difficulties and problems and solve them easily. Seeing running in a dream indicates success and excellence in his academic and professional life and overcoming all Challenges and crises. Seeing lifting weights in a dream is a sign that the dreamer bears responsibilities greater than his ability and ability to endure. Watching football or basketball in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s lightness and harmony with others, his sense of satisfaction with his life and the development of important steps to easily reach the goal. What is the interpretation Seeing exercise in a dream? Seeing exercise in a dream indicates strength and moderation of mind and taking advantage of all the important things in one’s life to reach the dream of his life. Seeing morning exercise in a dream Losing weight is a sign of strength, determination, and determination to coexist with others and solve problems. Seeing weight loss exercises in a dream The dream is a sign of losing confidence in oneself and in people who do not respect him

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a cow from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a cow Cows are considered beneficial animals for humans and have many benefits from them. As for seeing cows in a dream, it is good or there is another food substance that the dreamer must know. In the following lines, we will explain the details of that. To reassure the reader and not to be distracted by different opinions, get to know us. Interpretation of a dream about a cow Seeing cows in a dream for the dreamer symbolizes the positive transformations that will occur in his future life and will improve it for the better and he will live in bliss and prosperity. Following cows in a woman's vision leads her to know the news of her pregnancy in the following days after recovering from the diseases she suffered in the race that affected her and her back. Interpretation of a dream about a cow by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing cows in a dream for the dreamer indicates a large diet and an abundance of money that he will enjoy in the coming years of his life due to his patience in crises until he overcomes them and cows in a dream for the sleeper indicate good news that she will learn in the coming period and his life will change from sadness and writing to joy and happiness. Seeing cows in a dream for a girl leads her to reach her desires in life and achieve them on earth, and cows in the dreamer's dream symbolize his adherence to religion and Sharia and its application among people until his Lord is pleased with him. The Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write a site about the secrets of dream interpretation Search for it on Google And get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a single cow Seeing cows in an unmarried woman's dream indicates the good luck that she will live in the coming days and will be able to achieve her dreams and achieve them on the ground. Seeing a girl eating beef in a dream indicates her imminent marriage contract to a wealthy, beloved and religious man and she will live with him in affection and mercy. Interpretation of a dream about a married cow Seeing cows in a dream for a married woman symbolizes the happy married life she lives and her ability to combine her career and motherhood and achieve dazzling success in both. Seeing cows in a dream for a lady and her inability to get their milk leads to her betrayal by her closest friends and husband because of her excessive confidence and entering her home and knowing family secrets, so she must be careful not to regret it too late, and the cow in the dreamer's sleep symbolizes the end of the crises and sorrows that were. She was exposed to it in the past because of her inability to implement fateful decisions in a timely manner and she is always in a hurry, so she needs more patience and thinking. Interpretation of a dream about a cow for a pregnant woman Seeing cows in a dream for a pregnant woman means that she will give birth in the next few days and she and her child will be in good health and a cow in a dream for a woman means that her condition will be the kind she wants. God willing, she will be in good health and will not suffer from any disease and will become famous in the future. Seeing cows in a dream for a woman symbolizes the good news that she will meet her husband in the coming period, and getting an important promotion at work can feel

title: Interpretation of a dream about a thin man: Seeing a man with a thin body in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dream of losing weight, a thin body in a dream of an unmarried girl, a married woman and a pregnant woman, dream of losing weight, a beautiful body, to see a fat, thin Interpretation of a thin or fat person in a dream Being thin in a dream is weakness, humiliation and weakness, and a thin man or a thin person symbolizes problems, diseases and fears in a dream, and it was also said that a thin man is bad luck for whoever sees him walking towards him. Interpretation of a thin man in a dream of an unmarried girl The thinner or weaker his body is, the more in the dream the expression of psychological or moral problems in the unmarried, and the girl who sees her fiancé or lover thin as usual, this is an expression of the difficulty she faces. The issue of livelihood. And the unmarried girl who sees in her dream that a thin man marries her, this is his expression, the difficulties that he will face in the future, and the kindness to see the thin man that he is handsome or handsome despite his thinness, because the dream in this context can be an expression of the good luck that the girl meets after a wave of violent conflicts and problems in life and the thin man is praiseworthy if he is tall, because this expresses the long life of the one who saw his dream. Interpretation of the thin man in the dream of a married woman As for the married woman who sees in her dream that her husband has become thin, or if she sees that his ribs are prominent between the folds of his shirt or robe, this is an expression of poverty and need or lack of financial resources. Which do not cover the needs or expenses of the family. And if a married woman sees a man or a stranger entering her house and she is very thin, this is an expression of her disappointment in something she expected or hoped for. The good thing about this vision is that the stranger, the thin, the kind, the gentle, the delicate, because the dream in this context can express a commendable matter or event that can be found in the coming days, especially when this is a thin person. A person enters laden with gifts, sustenance or gifts, because this may express a desire that has eluded him in the past, but with God's grace and permission, it will soon be fulfilled. This interpretation applies to a pregnant woman, as the entry of a thin person with a beautiful face and sweet features into her house represents her easy and blessed birth. Interpretation of the transformation of a fat man into a thin person in a dream If a person sees in a dream that a fat man he knows has become thin and not thin, this is comfort or healing after a calamity, as for the owner of the dream, he sees as if the fat man has become very thin and weak. In his structure, unable to walk or speak, this is an expression of the serious problems they will face. Interpretation of a dead person in a dream became thin or weak The condition of the deceased in the dream expresses his status in the afterlife. If one sees him weak and weak in a way that is not his nature, this is an interpretation that the deceased lacked charity despite the abundance of livelihood, or that his bad deeds exceeded his good deeds. Perhaps the dream indicates his repentance before his death and its interpretation is forgiveness from the Creator, especially if he appears with a pure face and smiling disguise. Interpretation of dreams: Thinness and strength of the body - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about entering Hell in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about entering hell in a dream: We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about entering hell in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about entering hell in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he is escaping from hell may indicate that he will get rid of a major problem that the dreamer was in at that time. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about death for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about death for a single woman in a dream: The reasons for the death of an unmarried woman in a dream have many connotations and interpretations, and you will discover them all in the following paragraphs. Also, seeing death, burial, and a shroud is different from dying without burial in a dream. Find out the meaning of this vision in detail in the following lines. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Search on Google for the dream interpretation site on the Internet. Interpretation of a dream about death for a single woman. If an unmarried woman dies in a dream because she fell into a deep well, this is a warning and a warning to her against bad friends, and it can The vision warns her against neglect, disobedience, and straying from religion. If an unmarried woman dies in a dream as a result of falling from a high mountain, the vision is bad and indicates her removal from work or position, and perhaps the stagnation and professional failure that she will soon suffer from will directly affect her. The economic situation causes her losses and poverty. Seeing the death of an unmarried woman as a result of a car overturning in a dream is evidence of a serious disaster that will befall her in reality, and alms must be distributed to the poor and needy after this vision in order for the person who had the vision to receive it. Protection from the evil of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about death for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that if an unmarried woman sees herself dead in a dream and does not fall ill with any disease in the dream or feel pain in her body, then she will be happy with health, a long life and a beautiful life. If an unmarried woman dies Married in a dream and hearing her family screaming loudly and yelling at her, this is a sign of sadness that the dreamer is destined to experience in reality. All the apparent circumstances will suffer and suffer after this dream. An unmarried woman who did not fear God in her life, and she saw that he died in a dream, and then the spirit returned to her again, the vision shows a clear transformation and change in her life and morals, and she repents and seeks forgiveness from her. Oh God, live her afterlife for the sake of good deeds and the worship of Almighty God. If she dies unmarried and naked with no clothes in a dream, the vision reveals the bad financial condition that the dreamer is living in, and debts and hardships may burden her. The most important interpretations of a dream about death for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about escaping death for a single woman, if she is The dreamer had placed in a dream a hole full of scorpions, but she found someone she did not know who saved her from this hole before the scorpions attacked her. This dream confirms that the dreamer has immunity from God and that her enemies will not be able to do so. He harms her or deceives her in reality. And if the wise female escapes and is saved from the lion attacking her in a dream, this is good news for her protection from an unjust and very ungrateful enemy. The truth is that God saves her from their tyranny. Interpretation of a single woman’s dream about fear of death: Fear of death in anyone’s dream may indicate that he suffers from a phobia or anxiety about death in reality, and from here she will see many different dreams about death and perhaps wake up from her sleep in a state of panic. And fear of it. Communicate with her for several hours. If the dreamer sees people dressed in white with their faces covered with clothes

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a wet Qur’an in a dream: Seeing a wet Qur’an in a dream indicates the defect of the religion of the pioneer and shows some of the sins that he commits without being forbidden. Also, seeing a wet Qur’an in a dream indicates many sins, walking on a false path, and disobeying God Almighty. Also, seeing a wet Qur’an in a dream indicates many sins, walking on a false path, and disobeying God Almighty. In a dream, it indicates instability, tension, instability, and moving from one house to another. The intention of distributing the Qur’an indicates that the dreamer holds an important position or performs a service in the Kaaba and the Prophet’s Mosque. Interpretation of seeing the Qur’an getting wet in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is pregnant A wet Qur’an indicates the sins you commit and disobedience to God. Also, seeing a wet Qur’an shows some bad things done by an unmarried girl and shows her invalid marriage. Also, seeing the Qur’an coming out of the bathroom in a dream indicates the girl’s repentance to God Almighty, and His tremendous care. And the life that she enjoys. Interpretation of seeing a wet Qur’an in a dream for married people. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is carrying a wet Qur’an, then this vision indicates her impurity and that this woman is dishonest. But if she sees in her dream that she is drying the Qur’an in a dream, this indicates her desire to repent and shows good deeds. Likewise, seeing the wet Qur’an in the bathroom suggests that this woman’s house is not free of expansions and indicates her lack of remorse. Also, seeing the Qur’an being cleaned in a dream indicates the collapse of her problems, the end of her worries, and her husband’s entry into a new job, and his conditions will improve. Interpretation of seeing the Qur’an wet in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is kissing the Qur’an, this indicates the date of birth and the ease of her delivery. Likewise, if she is seen putting the Qur’an in the bathroom, this indicates her bad deeds and her lack of repentance to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing the Qur’an wet in a dream for a man: vision A man’s wet Qur’an in a dream indicates his marriage to a disabled girl and the differences that he will see throughout his life. Also, seeing a married man cleaning the Qur’an in a dream indicates his life with good offspring and joining a new job that he will be happy with. Giving the Qur’an in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is doing useful work. He will gain great wealth and a lot of money. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing yourself eating dates in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com, as seeing many dates in a dream is one of the most beautiful visions. Which portends all goodness and happiness to the owner of the vision, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision through our article about the single girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the married man, the single young man, and the pregnant woman. Divorced. What is the interpretation of seeing a single girl eating dates in a dream? Seeing a single girl eating a date in a dream indicates the approach of marriage and the beginning of a happy life that brings her a lot of nourishment. Seeing single people buying dates in a dream is an indication that she has good children who will have a great future and is a symbol of the high morals of her fiancé. See also: Interpretation of seeing dates distributed in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing dates in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman eating dates in a dream announces her happy and peaceful life with her husband and children and her intense love for them. Seeing a married woman stealing dates in a dream indicates the presence of major financial crises in her husband’s life. It may destroy his life. Seeing a married woman eating dates in a dream suggests mixing halal with illicit money and warning her to stay away from it. Dreaming of taking dates from a mitti indicates many positive changes in the life of a fortuneteller and halal money. See also: Interpretation of seeing keeping dates in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a man eating Dates in a dream? Seeing a man eating dates in a dream indicates the purity of his wife, her high morals, her good reputation among people, and benefiting them with her knowledge. Seeing a man distributing dates in a dream to the poor and needy is a sign of his intense love for goodness and helping others. Seeing receiving a date as a gift from another person in a man’s dream symbolizes That God sends him a lot of money through a relative. Seeing in a dream a man eating a lot of rebellion indicates his great need for kindness, tenderness, and love from others. Seeing a man burying dates in a dream proves that he received forbidden money through orphans or the needy. See also: Interpretation Seeing sweets in a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman eating dates in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman eating dates in a dream is an indication of bringing goodness to her, abundant sustenance, ease of birth, and overcoming every difficulty. Seeing a pregnant woman with cracked dates in a dream indicates raising her children well and providing a handsome boy. What is the interpretation of seeing a young man eating dates in a dream? Seeing a young man eating dates in a dream. His group of palm trees shows a close marriage with a chaste girl with good morals. Seeing a young man distributing dates in a dream shows that he gets a lot of money without making any effort. Seeing a young man eating a lot of dates Dates during his sleep are an example of his great love for his wife and the birth of many children from her. Seeing dates and seeds being absorbed in a dream and giving them to others shows the strength of the relationship between them and their strong love for each other. Dreaming of eating rebellion is a sign of wealth and a lot of money. See also: Interpretation of seeing a

title: Dreams indicate the return of divorced people

preview.html: Dreams show the return of divorced people through the Vision roy2a.com website. There are many people who divorce their spouses for many different reasons, despite the presence of love and wonderful feelings between them, and some of them do everything in their power to return again. And we begin a new, stable and happy life, and today through this article we will present to you Dreams indicate the return of divorced persons. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us. Dreams indicate the return of divorced persons. A divorced woman saw a relationship between her and her husband and was happy in a dream. She remembers that she will return to her husband. The ex is coming soon. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is fixing something broken, this indicates the end of the problems between her and her ex-husband and the beginning again. Walking in the snow in a divorced woman’s dream re-announces her marriage since her divorce. Seeing a divorced woman lifting the ruler from his place and returning him in a dream indicates her return to her ex-husband, and God knows best. See also: Dreams mean the return of the absent. Symbols that indicate the absolute return. Seeing a divorced woman changing her condition from night to day or vice versa in the dream shows that she will reconcile with her ex-husband and marry him again. The bed mattress in the final dream in reference to her return to her ex-husband, and God knows best. An absolute vision. Giving birth in a dream suggests that she will soon start a new life with her ex-husband and will be happy and stable. See also: Dreams show the exit of the model. Connotations of a divorced woman returning to her ex-husband in a dream. Seeing a divorced woman giving someone a gift in a dream indicates her return to her ex-husband in the coming period. Giving a dress to someone in a dream For a divorced woman, it indicates the beginning again with her ex-husband and the end of all the problems and arguments that existed between them. Seeing in a dream a divorced woman separating from her job announces her return to her ex-husband, and God knows best. Repairing old shoes in a divorced woman’s dream announces the marriage of a divorced woman. See also: Dreams show the appearance of the eye and envy. The dreams indicate On the marriage of a divorced woman. Eating sweets in a dream for a divorced woman. She re-announces her marriage to a person of good character. Wearing new shoes in a dream for a divorced woman. She announces her acquaintance with a good man. She will marry soon, and God knows best. Seeing a divorced woman wearing a white dress in a dream. This indicates that God will compensate her with a man who has many qualities that she will marry soon. Driving a car in a dream. A divorced dream states that he will get married soon, and God knows best. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream says that her wedding is coming again, and God knows best. See also: Dreams indicate that the term is near. Dreams mean peace. Seeing a hug in a dream indicates the end of all disputes between the dreamer and the person behind him in the dream. Eating fruit in a dream, which is It indicates the end of the disputes between the fortuneteller and the beloved in reality, and God knows best. Seeing a husband reconciling with his wife in a dream indicates that the coming period of their lives will end all problems and crises between them. A kiss in a married couple’s dream shows the great love between them and the overcoming of the problems they face. See also: I dreamed that I was practicing Sex with my wife We are happy to see the reception of your dreams about “Dreams indicating a return
